# BasicAuthenticationOptions.IssueClaims property

After credentials are valid, this is called to add extra Claims. Parameters: HttpContext, username → IEnumerable of extra claims.

```csharp
public Func<HttpContext, string, Task<IEnumerable<Claim>>>? IssueClaims { get; set; }
```
